original_text: He ran on in front of the crowd and he climbed up a fig tree. He could see Jesus more easily from the tree, because Jesus would walk along that way.
korean_text: 앞으로 달려가서 보기 위하여 돌무화과나무에 올라가니 이는 예수께서 그리로 지나가시게 됨이러라

sentences.original_text: He ran on in front of the crowd
and he climbed up a fig tree
He could see Jesus more easily from the tree
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 나무에서 예수님을 더 쉽게 볼 수 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: because Jesus would walk along that way
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 예수님께서 그 길을 따라 걸어가실 것이었기 때문입니다
